snippet: “100 Years: Titanic Survivors and Their Stories” will be staged on April 15, the anniversary of the disaster, at the Arts and Community Center on the campus of Ocean County College.
abstract: Traveling Literary Theater will perform 100 Years: Titanic Survivors and Their Stories, documentary play written by Maggie Worsdale, at Ocean County College in Toms River on April 15, the 100 year anniversary of the disaster; performance will be accompanied by music and food from the period (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: “100 Years: Titanic Survivors and Their Stories” will be staged on April 15, the anniversary of the disaster, at the Arts and Community Center on the campus of Ocean County College.

headline.main: Reliving the Day the Unsinkable Sank
headline.print_headline: Reliving the Day the Unsinkable Sank
